short_summary: Request for proposal for design and installation of security structure for cliff stabilization in Quebec.
description: The National Battlefields Commission is issuing a Request for Proposal for the design and installation of security structure for cliff stabilization in Quebec, Canada.
duration_in_months: You send the project to us and check if you can do it
full_summary:
================------
### Request for Proposal Number EE520-231980 

#### Stabilization of the Plains of Abraham cliff.

##### Maintenance and Installation of Security Structures

### Description

A REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL (RFP) is issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), acting on behalf of the National Battlefields Commission, for the provision of Stabilization of the Plains of Abraham cliff.

### Scope of Work

The scope of work consists of the maintenance and installation of security structures on a cliff at a national battleground site, located in Quebec, Canada. For detailed specifications, refer to Annex A.

### Tender Requirements

A Request for Proposal (RFP) is issued on a non-binding basis. Proposals should be submitted in electronic format. The closing date for bid submission is March 16, 2023, at 14:00 HAE, Eastern Daylight Time (EDT). Any submission received after this deadline will be considered non-conform.

### Evaluation Criteria

The lowest price from among all qualified submissions will be evaluated.

### Terms and Conditions

The solicitation is governed by the Cubic Installation Services and Support (CISS) solicitation terms and conditions and any amendments thereto.

### Miscellaneous 

This procurement is subject to the terms and conditions outlined below.
A Bidder's Guide is available for review and is contained on the following website: [TO BE INSERTED].

### Contact Information
